body_html:
I think I have find this bug. I will fix it soon.
I forgot to change the variable._save_slice_info.full_name in the previous commit, so there may be a potential bug in save and restore when user use variable._save_slice_info.full_name as scope name.
Now I remove real_slot_name = scope[len(primary.op.name + "/"):-1] with real_slot_name = slot.name[len(primary.op.name + "/"):-2], so the real_slot_name will be added as suffix of previous full_name correctly.
@lukaszkaiser Please review it again, thank you!

body:
I think I have find this bug. I will fix it soon.
I forgot to change the `variable._save_slice_info.full_name` in the previous commit, so there may be a potential bug in save and restore when user use `variable._save_slice_info.full_name` as scope name.
Now I remove `real_slot_name = scope[len(primary.op.name + "/"):-1]` with `real_slot_name = slot.name[len(primary.op.name + "/"):-2]`, so the `real_slot_name` will be added as suffix of previous `full_name` correctly.
@lukaszkaiser Please review it again, thank you!
